Services.title: Our Services
Services.subtitle: EuroSource specializes in connecting you with the best suppliers from Germany and Europe. We handle every step of your sourcing journey with expertise and care.
Services.sourcingDesc: We identify and connect you with the most reliable and innovative suppliers across Germany and Europe for your specific needs.
Services.negotiationDesc: Our expert negotiators work on your behalf to secure the best terms, pricing, and conditions with your suppliers.
Services.logisticsDesc: We manage the complete logistics chain, from warehousing to delivery, ensuring your products reach you on time.
Services.customsDesc: Our customs experts handle all documentation and regulatory requirements to ensure smooth border crossings.
Services.qualityDesc: We perform rigorous quality inspections at every stage to guarantee your products meet the highest standards.
Services.supportDesc: Our dedicated support team is available around the clock to assist with any questions or issues.

Gallery.sectionDesc: Connect directly with top European manufacturers and suppliers across multiple industries. Our curated selection includes automotive components, industrial equipment, furniture, packaging solutions, and consumer products. Each supplier has been vetted for quality, reliability, and competitive pricing. Start your sourcing journey today with access to Europe's most trusted suppliers.

automotive.title: Premium German Vehicles
automotive.description: Quality automotive vehicles and components sourced directly from German manufacturers. We ensure all products meet international standards and arrive in perfect condition.

electronics.title: Industrial Labeling Machines
electronics.description: Precision labeling and packaging equipment from French manufacturers. Perfect for production lines requiring high-speed, accurate labeling with full certification and technical support.

textiles.title: Furniture & Interior Design
textiles.description: Premium furniture and interior design products from certified Polish manufacturers. We handle quality control and logistics end-to-end for residential and commercial projects.

machinery.title: Material Handling Equipment
machinery.description: Industrial forklifts and material handling machinery carefully selected and exported from German precision manufacturers with complete documentation and warranty support.

chemicals.title: Toy Manufacturing & Plastics
chemicals.description: Premium toy manufacturing and plastic products sourced from Danish industry leaders. We ensure safe, certified products meeting international quality standards and compliance requirements.

Marketing.whyChooseDesc: Partner with Europe's most trusted sourcing solution for direct access to premium manufacturers and suppliers.
Marketing.directSourcingDesc: We connect you directly with vetted manufacturers across Germany, France, Poland, and other EU countries.
Marketing.point1: Access to 1+ million verified European suppliers
Marketing.testimonial: As an importer serving Middle Eastern and African markets, finding reliable European suppliers was challenging until we partnered with EuroSource. They handle everything from supplier vetting to customs documentation, making our operations significantly more efficient.

Contact.title: Get in Touch
Contact.subtitle: Connect with European suppliers and manufacturers for your import needs.
Contact.successSubtitle: We'll get back to you within 24 hours.
Contact.subject: SUBJECT
Contact.messagePlaceholder: Tell us about your sourcing needs, products you're interested in, or any questions you have...

Footer.brandDesc: Connecting businesses with Europe's finest manufacturers and suppliers.

EuropeanExports.title: What does Europe export?
EuropeanExports.subtitle: Europe leads global trade in high-value sectors. Access these industries directly through EuroSource.

engineering.title: Precision Engineering & Industrial Machinery
engineering.description: Europe's powerhouse for reliable, high-spec industrial equipment, essential for global infrastructure development.

fashion.title: Luxury Fashion & Designer Goods
fashion.examples: Leather handbags, Haute couture textiles, Fine watches
fashion.description: Access prestigious European craftsmanship and cutting-edge design in high-end textiles, leather, and premium accessories.

automotive.title: High-End Automotive & Mobility Solutions
automotive.examples: Cars, Electric vehicle batteries, Advanced safety systems
automotive.description: Source leadership in automotive engineering, advanced EV components, and innovative mobility solutions.

food.title: Premium Food & Beverage
food.examples: Chocolate, Italian olive oil, Artisanal cheeses
food.description: Discover high-demand, high-quality European brands, from chocolates and spirits to artisanal cheeses and organic products.

pharma.title: Advanced Pharmaceutical & Biotech
pharma.description: The EU's fastest-growing high-tech sector, providing world-class medical treatments and research.

energy.title: Green Energy & Sustainable Technology
energy.examples: Solar panels, Wind turbine blades, Energy storage systems
energy.description: Source European expertise in future-focused, renewable energy components like wind turbine parts and advanced solar technology.

QualityBadge.title: Quality Guaranteed
QualityBadge.subtitle: Every product sourced through EuroSource meets rigorous European quality standards.

AboutUs.title: About EuroSource
AboutUs.subtitle: Your trusted partner for European sourcing and trade solutions.
AboutUs.storyP1: EuroSource was founded with a simple mission: to bridge the gap between European manufacturers and global businesses. Based in Berlin, Germany, we leverage our deep understanding of the European market to help companies worldwide access premium products and reliable suppliers.
AboutUs.storyP2: Our team combines decades of experience in international trade, logistics, and supplier relations. We understand the challenges of cross-border sourcing and have built our processes to make it seamless for our clients.
AboutUs.missionDesc: To simplify international sourcing by providing businesses with direct access to verified European suppliers, transparent pricing, and end-to-end logistics support.
AboutUs.visionDesc: To become the most trusted bridge between European manufacturers and global markets, enabling businesses of all sizes to access quality European products.
AboutUs.value1Desc: We rigorously vet every supplier and product to ensure they meet the highest European standards.
AboutUs.value2Desc: We build long-term relationships with both suppliers and clients based on trust and mutual success.
AboutUs.value3Desc: We streamline complex processes to save you time and reduce costs without compromising quality.
AboutUs.ctaDesc: Connect with us today and discover how we can help your business access Europe's finest products.

Careers.title: Join Our Team
Careers.subtitle: Help us connect businesses with Europe's best manufacturers.
Careers.benefit1Desc: Work with clients and suppliers from around the world in a truly global business.
Careers.benefit2Desc: As a growing company, we offer plenty of opportunities to develop your career.
Careers.benefit3Desc: We believe in work-life balance with flexible working arrangements.
Careers.benefit4Desc: Attractive salary and benefits package commensurate with experience.
Careers.noPositions: No open positions at the moment.
Careers.noPositionsDesc: We're always looking for talented individuals. Send us your CV for future opportunities.
Careers.spontaneousDesc: Don't see a role that fits? We're always interested in meeting talented people who share our passion for international trade.

Collaboration.title: Partner With Us
Collaboration.subtitle: Explore collaboration opportunities with EuroSource.
Collaboration.type1Desc: European manufacturers looking to expand their global reach through our network.
Collaboration.type2Desc: Local representatives who can help us serve clients in their region.
Collaboration.type3Desc: Shipping and customs specialists to enhance our delivery capabilities.
Collaboration.step1Desc: Reach out to us with your collaboration proposal and company information.
Collaboration.step2Desc: We review your proposal and assess the potential synergies between our businesses.
Collaboration.step3Desc: If there's a good fit, we formalize our partnership with clear terms and mutual goals.
Collaboration.ctaDesc: We're always open to new partnerships that can add value for our clients.

ThankYou.title: Thank You!
ThankYou.subtitle: Your message has been received. We appreciate your interest and will respond as soon as possible.
